pkgmetadata.longdescription: Viewscape Analysis // A collection of functions to make R a more effective viewscape analysis tool for calculating viewscape metrics based on computing the viewable area for given a point/multiple viewpoints and a digital elevation model.The method of calculating viewscape metrics implemented in this package are based on the work of Tabrizian et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.landurbplan.2019.103704. The algorithm of computing viewshed is based on the work of Franklin Ray. (1994) https://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/document?repid=rep1type=pd fdoi=555780f6f5d7e537eb1edb28862c86d1519af2be.
